name: Kingdom Siege
description:
A 3D RTS game where you play as a small settlement in-between two kingdoms at war. The only way to survive is to defeat one of the kingdoms by buildings up a bank of resources and a army. But beware of the encroaching taxes which build up when units are recruited and when buildings are built.

This was a school project in the second year. Might contain loads of bugs and is not optimized in any way. It was made in early 2017.
